description: Indian-spiced vegetables topped with golden filo pastry and served with mango chutney, this delicious vegetarian recipe will have the whole family asking for seconds!
name: Bombay-inspired Potato Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 pkt Woolworths frozen peas, corn & carrot

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon potato mixture into a 14 x 26cm (4cm deep) baking pan. Cover pastry with a clean, damp tea towel to prevent it drying out. Place 1 pastry sheet on a flat surface. Lightly spray with oil, then loosely scrunch and place on top of filling. Repeat with remaining pastry sheets and oil until filling is covered. Spray pastry top with oil and season. Bake for 40 minutes or until golden. Scatter over coriander and serve with mango chutney.
